body:
Also, we are now seeing this:
```
00:09:14.146 c:\tmp\_bazel_system\424zmya1\execroot\org_tensorflow\bazel-out\msvc_x64-py3-opt\genfiles\external\local_config_python\numpy_include\numpy\numpyconfig.h(4): fatal error C1083: Cannot open include file: '_numpyconfig.h': No such file or directory
```

Any idea what causes this?
